alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Thomas and east central Sherman Counties through 415 PM MDT/515 PM CDT/... At 342 PM MDT/442 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brewster, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Levant. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 32 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Goodland.
